zh.title: Solana/美元技术分析：[短期震荡，趋势待明]
zh.content:
当前Solana（SOL/USD）的价格为134.12美元，短期内表现出一定的震荡趋势。24小时变化为1.43%，显示出市场情绪的相对稳定。价格在135.06美元的高点和131.29美元的低点之间波动，表明买卖双方的力量尚未完全分化，可能在等待更明确的市场信号。

从技术指标来看，MACD值为-1.96867，表明当前市场可能处于下行压力之中，但尚未形成明确的卖出信号。SMA(20)为135.1815，距离当前价格相对接近，可能作为短期内的阻力位。RSI(14)数据缺失，无法提供超买或超卖的参考，但整体趋势仍需关注市场的进一步变化。

在支撑位方面，131.29美元是当前的关键支撑区间，若价格突破这个水平，可能会引发更大的下行压力。相反，135.06美元则是重要的阻力位，若能突破，将可能带来新的上涨机会。建议投资者密切关注价格在这些关键水平的表现，以指导后续的交易决策。

综合分析，SOL/USD目前在短期内处于震荡整理阶段，建议投资者保持谨慎，适时调整仓位。如果价格突破阻力位135.06美元，可以考虑逢高布局；若跌破支撑位131.29美元，则应考虑止损离场。

en.title: Solana vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Solana is currently trading at 134.12, reflecting a modest 1.43% increase over the past 24 hours. The recent price action suggests a consolidation phase following the recent highs around 135.06. Buyers appear to be defending the 131.29 level, which serves as a crucial support zone. A sustained move above 135.06 could indicate a bullish trend continuation, while a breakdown below 131.29 might signal further bearish momentum.

The absence of the RSI(14) makes it challenging to assess momentum, but the MACD value of -1.96867 indicates a bearish sentiment that could persist if downward pressure continues. The SMA(20) stands at 135.1815, acting as a dynamic resistance level. If the price can maintain above this moving average, it may attract further buying interest. Traders should monitor for potential crossovers in the MACD, which could provide insights into changing momentum.

Support levels are currently established at 131.29 and further down at 130.00, where buyers could step in to prevent deeper corrections. On the upside, resistance levels are seen at 135.06 and 137.50. A break through these resistance points could trigger a new wave of buying, particularly if accompanied by increased trading volume. 

In the short term, traders may consider entering long positions if the price holds above the SMA(20) and breaks decisively above 135.06. Conversely, a failure to hold the 131.29 support could warrant short positions with a target near 130.00. Risk management remains crucial, and traders should set stop-loss orders to mitigate potential losses in this volatile market.
